channel.title: Aman Bagrecha
channel.description: Aman is a geospatial scientist at Galaxeye Space and runs a geospatial community Lets Talk Spatial

item.title: Surface Water Extent using Sentinel-2 Imagery
item.description: It allows the user to select a reservoir—either by entering its objectid or by clicking on the map—and then analyzes the reservoir’s water extent over time using Sentinel‐2 imagery.

item.title: Non Local Means Visualisation
item.description: It allows the user to visualise the inner workings of the NL-means algorithm.

item.title: Train 1Spacenet 5 CRESI Algorithm to extract road network from Satellite Imagery.
item.description: Extract Road Network from Satellite Imagery

item.title: SMAP Soil Moisture Time Series Analysis
item.description: This script downloads SMAP L3 data and computes the soil moisture time series for specified region.

item.title: Openlayers Query via Geoserver
item.description: This application demonstrates how to display and query all geoserver layers or from a workspace using geoserver REST API. CQL (Common Query Language) filter provided by geoserver is used to query the layer.

item.title: Predicting Age group of Social Media Application users
item.description: The task at hand is to predict the age group of social media (app) users. Given the data of their users ranging from number of followers they have to hours they spend on the app, we are on the quest to solve what is the demography of the app.

item.title: Structural Modelling and analysis of concrete canoe hull
item.description: As part of concrete canoe competition representing team ASCE RVCE, the canoe hull was designed and analysed using SAP2000 and maxsurf

item.title: Analyse professional degree student enrolment v/s university count
item.description: To evaluate the trend in higher education over the years based on gender, state, and degree program.

item.title: Land Surface Temperature
item.description: Determining Land Surface Temperature of Bengaluru in ArcGIS using Landsat 8 product.

item.title: Radiant Earth Spot the Crop Hackathon
item.description: Hackathon to classify crop type in south africa Based on time-series of Sentinel-1 satellite images. Stood at 5th place on public leaderboard.

item.title: Web application to access store information on click of marker!
item.description: store-info is developed to let users access the whereabouts of store using Leaflet.

item.title: Django-rest-framework CRUD Token Authetication Application
item.description: Create API end points for DRF-CRUD and add security layer using Token Authentication.

item.title: Geocoding using Mapbox API
item.description: This Application demonstrates how to geocode an address using mapbox api implemented in openlayers v6. Additionally, on-click of search, the map gets zoomed to the location of Interest.
